markdown:
<title level="1" right="Action">[Invoke Celestial Privilege](/Actions.aspx?ID=702) <actions string="Reaction" /></title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 123 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Trigger** You attempt a saving throw against a [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48) effect, but you haven't rolled yet.

</column>

---

You rise above the triggering effect, refusing to be harmed by it. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the triggering saving throw and to any other saving throws you attempt against divine effects until the start of your next turn.
name: Invoke Celestial Privilege
